<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='50',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-10378-1\task183368\10378-1-bc.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Sep 10 13:15 2004' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1996 Employee Stock Purchase Plan</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In February&nbsp;1997, the Company adopted the 1996
Employee Stock Purchase Plan (the &#147;ESPP&#148;) whereby 250,000 shares of Common
Stock were reserved for issuance and purchase by employees of the Company to
assist them in acquiring a stock ownership interest in the Company and to
encourage them to remain employees of the Company.&#160; In November&nbsp;1998, the shareholders
approved an amendment to increase the total number of shares of Common Stock
from 250,000 to 500,000 shares.&#160; In
November&nbsp;2003, the shareholders approved an amendment to increase the
total number of shares of Common Stock from 500,000 to 600,000 shares.&#160; The ESPP is qualified under Section&nbsp;423
of the Internal Revenue Code and permits eligible employees to purchase Common
Stock at a discount through payroll deductions during specified six-month
offering periods.&#160; No employee may
purchase more than $25,000 worth of stock in any calendar year or 1,500 shares
in any one offering period. The ESPP is administered by the Compensation
Committee appointed by the Board of Directors and provides generally that the
purchase price must not be less than 85% of the fair market value of the Common
Stock on the first or last day of the offering period, whichever is lower.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During fiscal years 2004, 2003 and 2002, a total of
51,850, 40,720 and 51,076 shares, respectively, were issued for combined
proceeds of $658,000, $405,000 and $301,000, respectively.&#160; As of June&nbsp;30, 2004 approximately
156,000 shares were available for grant.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h4 style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOTE 10 - 401(k)
PLAN</font></b></h4>

<h4 style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></h4>

<p align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In January&nbsp;1994, the Company adopted an employee savings and
retirement plan (the &#147;401(k) Plan&#148;) covering all of the Company&#146;s
employees.&#160; The 401(k) Plan permits but
does not require matching contributions by the Company on behalf of all
participants.&#160; The Company matches
employee contributions at 75%, for up to 6% of an employee&#146;s pretax
income.&#160; The totals of these employer
contributions were $660,000, $520,000 and $538,000 in fiscal years 2004, 2003
and 2002, respectively.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOTE
11 &#150; ACCRUED RESTRUCTURING CHARGES</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">During
the fourth quarter of fiscal year 2001, the Company recorded a pretax charge of
$2,535,000, including $2,172,000 in inventory and fixed asset impairments and
$363,000 of restructuring charges, related to the sale of its Travan-based WS30
and EDT40 tape drive designs and related assets and the exit of the entry-level
tape drive business including the planned closure of its Longmont, Colorado
facility.</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">During
fiscal year 2002, the Company increased the restructuring accrual for facility
rent by $228,000 to reflect an adjustment in the estimated liability related to
the closure of the Longmont facility, based upon the increased amount of time
the Company believed would be required to sublease the facility, given the
weakening real estate market in Longmont, Colorado.</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:45.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subsequent to the termination of the Travan based
development project in May 2002, the Company temporarily used the Longmont
facility for certain engineering operations primarily related to its software
products.&#160; During the third quarter of
fiscal year 2003, the Company completed the relocation of all operations from
the Longmont facility to its San Diego headquarters.&#160; After the relocation the Company re-evaluated
its accrual related to the Longmont facility lease.&#160; While the Company continues to pursue
sub-lease opportunities, based upon the current commercial real estate market
in Longmont, it determined that it was unlikely that it will be able to sub-lease
the property and recorded an additional charge of $156,000 as an operating
expense within research and development to accrue all of the remaining payments
due under the lease.&#160; The accrued
facility costs are expected to be paid over the remaining life of the lease,
which expires in November&nbsp;2005.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">51</font></p>

<div align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">The

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NOTE 12 - COMMITMENTS AND
CONTINGENCIES</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Leases</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company leases its
office, production and sales facilities under non-cancelable operating leases,
which expire in various years through fiscal year 2018.&#160; The leases provide for biennial or annual
rent escalations intended to approximate increases in cost of living indices,
and certain of the leases provide for rent abatement.&#160; At June&nbsp;30, 2004, future minimum lease
payments under these arrangements are as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During fiscal year 2001,
the Company entered into an operating lease agreement for a new 158,000 square
foot headquarter facility to be constructed in San Diego, California.&#160; The lease commenced upon the Company&#146;s
occupancy of the building in February&nbsp;2002.&#160; The lease is for a period of twelve years and
can be renewed for one additional five-year period.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Rental expense is
recognized ratably over the respective lease terms and aggregated $3,754,000,
$3,843,000 and $2,520,000 for fiscal years 2004, 2003 and 2002, respectively.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">52</font></p>

<div style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>


<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='52',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-10378-1\task183368\10378-1-bc.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Sep 10 13:15 2004' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h4 style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Guarantees</font></b></h4>

<h4 style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></h4>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company&#146;s standard
warranty is a three year advance replacement return-to-factory warranty that
covers both parts and labor.&#160; For
products that it distributes and for drives and tapes used in its products that
are manufactured by a third party, the Company passes on to the customer the
warranty provided by the manufacturer.&#160;
The Company also provides on-site service for the first warranty year of
its higher-end products, for which it contracts with third-party service
providers.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company provides for
the estimated cost of product warranties at the time revenue is
recognized.&#160; The Company&#146;s product
warranty liability reflects its best estimate of probable liability under its
product warranties. &#160;The Company
estimates the warranty based on expected product failure rates, historical
experience, and other currently available information.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company also sells
extended on-site warranties for certain products for which revenue is deferred
and recognized over the warranty period.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Changes in the liability for product warranty and
deferred revenue associated with extended warranties for the fiscal year ended
June&nbsp;30, 2004 were as follows (in thousands):</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="80%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:80.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="69%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:69.7%;">

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>

  Warranty</font></b></p>

  <td width="69%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:69.7%;">

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">

  </td>

  <p align="right" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1,284</font></p>

  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in .7pt 0in;width:1.02%;">

<p align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Litigation</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In January&nbsp;2003,
Raytheon Company filed a lawsuit against the Company and various other
companies in the United States District Court for the Eastern District of
Texas.&#160; The complaint alleged that the
Company&#146;s products infringed a patent held by Raytheon.&#160; Raytheon demanded that the defendants stop
selling infringing products, pay Raytheon for their past use of the invention
under the patent and pay Raytheon&#146;s costs and expenses and its reasonable
attorney fees. &#160;The Company asserted
counterclaims seeking to have the subject patent declared invalid,
unenforceable and not infringed by the Company.&#160;
Effective in April&nbsp;2004, the Company settled this lawsuit with
Raytheon and both parties agreed to dismiss with prejudice their respective
claims and counterclaims against each other.&#160;
Although the specific terms of the settlement with Raytheon are
confidential, the Company is now fully licensed under the subject patent and
its business and products are unaffected by the settlement.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company is from time to time involved in various
lawsuits and legal proceedings that arise in the ordinary course of
business.&#160; In the opinion of management,
the amount of any ultimate liability with respect to these actions will not
materially affect the Company&#146;s consolidated financial statements or results of
operations.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Purchase Obligations</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The company has agreements with suppliers to purchase
inventory and other goods and services and estimates its noncancelable
obligations under these agreements to be approximately $12,900,000 in fiscal
2005.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">53</font></p>

<div style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>


<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='53',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-10378-1\task183368\10378-1-bc.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Sep 10 13:15 2004' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NOTE 13 &#150; SELECTED QUARTERLY
FINANCIAL DATA (UNAUDITED)</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following table
presents selected quarterly financial information for the periods
indicated.&#160; This information has been
derived from the Company&#146;s unaudited quarterly consolidated financial
statements, which in the opinion of management includes all adjustments
(consisting only of normal recurring adjustments) necessary for a fair presentation
of such information.&#160; The quarterly per
share data presented below was calculated separately and may not sum to the
annual figures presented in the Consolidated Financial Statements. These
operating results are also not necessarily indicative of results for any future
period.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">OVERLAND
DATA, INC.</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><a name="ScheduleiiValuationAndQualifyingA"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">SCHEDULE&nbsp;II
&#151; VALUATION AND QUALIFYING ACCOUNTS</font></b></a></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">FISCAL
YEARS ENDED JUNE&nbsp;30, 2004, 2003 and 2002</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  Year</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.04%;">

  <p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Balance at<br>
  Beginning<br>
  of Year</font></b></p>

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.04%;">

  </td>

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.06%;">

  </td>
  <td width="11%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.46%;">
  <p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">End of</font></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left">

</font></div>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*&#160; Amounts written off against the allowance,
net of recoveries.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<TYPE>EX-10.9
<SEQUENCE>2
<FILENAME>a04-10378_1ex10d9.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.9
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>



</head>

<body link="blue" vlink="purple">

<div style="font-family:'Times New Roman';">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT 10.9</font></b></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="128" height="28" src="g103781kcimage002.gif"></font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">LOAN MODIFICATION</font></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Loan Modification
(this &#147;Modification&#148;) is entered into on this 30<sup>TH</sup> day of August,
2002, by and between <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">OVERLAND STORAGE, INC.</font></b>, a California
corporation, formerly known as <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Overland Data, Inc</font></b> as &#147;Borrower&#148;, and <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">COMERICA
BANK-CALIFORNIA</font></b>, a California banking corporation, as &#147;Bank&#148;.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h1 style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">RECITALS</font></u></b></h1>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Modification is
entered into upon the basis of the following facts and understandings of the
parties, which facts and understandings are acknowledged by the parties to be
true and accurate:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Bank
has previously made certain loans (collectively, the &#147;Loan&#148;) to Overland Data
Inc. pursuant to the terms and conditions of (i) that certain Business Loan
Agreement dated as of November&nbsp;28, 2001 (the &#147;Agreement&#148;), and (ii) that
certain Master Revolving Note dated as of November&nbsp;28, 2001 in the
original principal amount of Ten Million Dollars ($10,000,000) (the &#147;Note&#148;).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
obligations of Overland Data, Inc under the Agreement, and the Note are secured
by, among other things, the granting of a security interest in and to all of
Overland Data, Inc personal property assets pursuant to the Agreement.&#160; The granting of such security interest was
perfected by a filed Financing Statement, Form UCC-1 dated of even date
therewith, and filed with the Secretary of State of California on
December&nbsp;26, 2001 as document No. 0136160667.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Agreement, the Note, and the UCC, together with all other documents and
instruments executed in connection with the Loan, are hereinafter referred to
collectively as the &#147;Loan Documents.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Subsequent
to the Loan, on June&nbsp;28, 2002, Overland Data, Inc. amended its Articles of
Organization to provide for a change in the name of OVERLAND STORAGE, INC (the
&#147;Amendment&#148;).&#160; The Amendment was filed
in the Office of the Secretary of State of California on June&nbsp;28, 2002.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Notwithstanding
any provisions of the Loan Documents to the contrary, Borrower has requested
that Bank consent to the Amendment and refrain from exercising its rights and
remedies under the Loan Documents.&#160; Bank
hereby consents to the Amendment, subject to the terms and conditions set forth
below.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AGREEMENT</font></u></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW THEREFORE, for good
and valuable consideration, the receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, the
parties hereto agree as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Bank&#146;s
agreement to consent to the Amendment shall only be with respect to Borrower&#146;s
name change pursuant to the Amendment and except as specifically provided
herein, the Loan Documents shall remain in full force and effect in accordance
with their original terms and conditions.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>None
of the terms or provisions of the Loan Documents or this Modification may
bewaived, altered, modified, limited, or amended except by a written agreement
expressly referring to the Loan Documents and/or this Modification and duly
signed by both Bank and Borrower.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Wherever
the term &#147;Borrower&#148; is used in the Loan Documents, it shall hereafter mean <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Overland
Storage, Inc</font></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Legal
Effect.</u>&#160;&#160; Except as specifically set
forth in this Modification, all of the terms and conditions of the Loan
Documents shall remain in full force and effect.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Further
Documents.</u>&#160; Borrower hereby agrees
to execute any documents requested by Bank to effectuate this Modification,
including without limitation a Financing Statement Amendment, Form UCC-2 to
amend the name of Debtor on the UCC.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Integration.</u>&#160;&#160; This is an integrated Modification, and
supersedes all prior negotiations and agreements regarding the subject matter
hereof.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the
parties have agreed as of the date first set forth above.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">

  </td>

<DOCUMENT>

<FILENAME>a04-10378_1ex10d17.htm

<TEXT>
<html>

<head>





</head>

<body lang="EN-US" link="blue" vlink="purple">

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">CONFIDENTIAL PORTIONS OF THIS DOUCMENT HAVE<br>
BEEN REDACTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE COMMISSION.</font></i></b></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT
10.17</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AMENDMENT
THREE</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">TO </font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">VR<sup>2</sup>
TECHNOLOGY LICENSE AGREEEMENT</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This THIRD AMENDMENT&#160; is made this 29th day of March, 2004 by and
between, <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Storage Technology Corporation</font></b>, a
Delaware corporation, having its principal place of business at One StorageTek
Dr., Louisville, Colorado 80028 (&#147;StorageTek&#148;), and <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Overland
Storage, Inc.</font></b>, having its principal place of business at 4820
Overland Avenue, San Diego, California&#160;&#160;
92123 (&#147;Contractor&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Whereas, StorageTek
requests Contractor&#146;s Services and expertise in the re-design of the PRML ASIC,
and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Whereas, Contractor
desires to provides such Services, </font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Now therefore, the
parties agree to amend the following sections pursuant to the VR2 TECHNOLOGY
LICENSE AGREEMENT executed between the parties on July&nbsp;20, 2000:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.2.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Contract
Engineering Services [***]</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Add the following for the
[***] of StorageTek&#146;s PRML ASIC for the [***] provided to Contractor by
StorageTek.&#160; Consulting activities shall
be performed at Contractor&#146;s facility and shall include but are not limited to
the following: [***]</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.6in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Such services shall be
completed on or before [***].&#160; Specific
timelines and milestones shall be mutually agreed upon between Contractor and
the StorageTek Project Manager.&#160;
Contractor shall contact the StorageTek Project Manager when the
verification is complete and when the tape is forwarded to Kawasaki for
creation of the chip.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As consideration for such
contract engineering Services, StorageTek agrees to pay Contractor [***] based
on achievement of the following milestones:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 76.5pt;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Completion of the [***] and delivery to
[***] &#150; [***]</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Completion of 1<sup>st</sup> and 2<sup>nd</sup>
signoff of [***] fabrication &#150; [***]</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Completion of chip testing and final signoff
by StorageTek Project Manager or a designated representative &#150; [***]</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Contractor shall invoice
StorageTek at the completion of each milestone.&#160;
Invoices pursuant to Amendment Three shall reference StorageTek purchase
order [***].&#160; Invoices shall be payable
within [***] days after receipt.&#160; The
above amounts do not anticipate billing for any out-of-pocket expenses.&#160; Any such expenses to be incurred and billed
by Contractor must be approved in advance by the StorageTek Project Manager,
[***].</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.3</font></b>
Termination</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Add
the following language which shall be valid pursuant to Amendment Three only:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">StorageTek may terminate this Amendment Three with
[***] prior written notice to Overland.&#160;
Such termination notice shall be given to Overland pursuant to section&nbsp;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">11.3 Notice</font></b>. </font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">At
the time of termination, StorageTek shall be released from any and all
obligations under this Amendment provided, that in the event of termination,
the Contractor shall be paid the balance owing for any reimbursable expenses
accrued to the date of termination, and shall be paid for Services
satisfactorily performed to the date of termination, less any amounts
previously prepaid.&#160; If </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>


<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\JMS\ahanson\04-10378-1\task183274\10378-1-kd.htm',USER='ahanson',CD='Sep 10 10:34 2004' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">CONFIDENTIAL PORTIONS OF THIS DOUCMENT HAVE<br>
BEEN REDACTED AND FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE COMMISSION.</font></i></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the
Contractor&#146;s fee has been specified on the basis of a definite sum for the
completion of Services, the sum payable upon termination shall be based upon
the percent of the Services satisfactorily completed.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">All
other terms and conditions of the agreement, as amended, remain the same.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF,</font></b>
the parties have caused their duly authorized representatives to sign this <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">SERVICES AGREEMENT</font></b> as of the date first stated above.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
